info.name: Open Veil API
info.description: API endpoints for the Open Veil WordPress plugin

request.description: Get all trials for a protocol
Update an existing protocol (only parameters provided will be updated)
Update just the laser_wavelength field of a protocol
Delete a protocol (only if it has no associated trials)

body.raw:

request.description: Create a new trial with full questionnaire data
Update an existing trial (only parameters provided will be updated)
Update just a single field in the questionnaire
